page.title: 08Games we Play in 1985
page.content: I like to play the game 'Horse and Jockey' which is a game which is played in the following way. First of all you have a partner and one person sits out and they have to blow a whistle. If it blown twice you have to run and jump on your partner's back, and whoever is slowest is out. If the whistle is bl0wn once you keep on going around the room and it can made you very hot. Another game I like to play is 'Oxford and Cambridge', again you have a partner and you sit on the floor,and you have a number you have to run down the middle and up the side,and the first to complete the run and sit down gets points for the team.Another game is called 'key's, in this game you have to tie a scarf around a partner eyes,and they have the keys in front of them.There is a circle of people
